Short Description: A Place At Home is a non-medical in-home senior care franchise providing multiple revenue streams, personalized training and support and key market availability.
Long Description: A Place At Home is a growing senior care franchise offering a recession-resistant concept in the booming industry of private duty non-medical in-home care. What differentiates us is Senior Focused Care, a multi-revenue stream approach only found at A Place At Home. Additional differentiators include our proven business growth roadmap called CARE Track, our tight-knit franchise family culture, low-cost initial investment, and personalized support with senior care industry veterans. If you want to focus full-time on building a strong financially rewarding business that positively impacts the lives of seniors in your community, then you may be a good fit for A Place At Home!

Short Description: Start your own successful medical billing business with American Business Systems, the business opportunity with live training, lifetime support, and a 100% money-back guarantee.
Long Description: American Business Systems provides a comprehensive toolbox of revenue cycle management solutions. With flexible, scalable, recurring revenue business models and no territorial restrictions, ABS is the ideal business opportunity for individuals with a strong desire to grow their own business. ABS owners have helped doctors increase their revenue by 20-30% and achieved an ROI in less than 12 months with only one client. With a total investment under $30,000 and a 100% money-back guarantee, ABS is the fastest way to start your own successful medical billing business.

Short Description: Amada Senior Care provides franchise partners with a scalable, multi-revenue business model in the $90B senior care industry, leveraging proven systems, cutting-edge technology, and hands-on support to ensure success. Every senior care franchise will tell you they offer proven systems and a recession-resistant industry. Amada Senior Care takes it further. We redefine the senior care business with innovation, unparalleled flexibility, and a support system that transforms franchisees into community leaders. Here’s why Amada stands out in the $90 billion senior care market.
Long Description: Amada Senior Care is transforming the senior care industry by combining innovation, quality, and opportunity. Our franchise model offers four revenue streams—Home Care, Senior Placement, Skilled Care, and Staffing—on a unified platform designed for scalability and efficiency.

Short Description: Archadeck is the world’s largest custom design builder of custom decks, screened porches, open porches, outdoor kitchens, fireplaces, hardscapes, and other outdoor living spaces. Archadeck has completed over $1 billion in projects for over 75,000 clients since 1980. Archadeck provides rigorous training, a proven sales methodology, in-house drafting department, in-depth franchise support and marketing systems that enable our franchisees to sell, design, and install professional outdoor living environments with unparalleled service and attention to detail.
Long Description: Whether you are considering starting your own business, or wish to expand and diversify your existing company, Archadeck’s unique custom design and build outdoor living franchise model might be the perfect franchise business opportunity for you!

Short Description: Aussie Pet Mobile is a quality pet grooming service that offers an exceptional full service grooming experience for your pets in a stress free environment in full comfort and safety right in your driveway.
Long Description: With over 25 years of experience, our proven business model and comprehensive training program ensure that you are fully equipped to succeed in this growing industry. Our state-of-the-art mobile grooming vans are fully equipped with all the necessary tools and supplies, so you can provide top-notch grooming services right at your customers’ doorsteps.

Short Description: We resolve the biggest two issues women face as they age–stubborn weight and all PMS/Menopause symptoms! BeBalanced’s program uses the power of natural hormone balancing to work with your body to correct key hormone imbalances that are causing these common issues.. We provide proprietary tools to help you achieve overall physical well-being by targeting the hormones that affect your weight, sleep, mood, and energy.
Long Description: BeBalanced Hormone Weight Loss Centers help women improve their health and overall wellness by balancing their hormones. Our proven weight-loss method has helped thousands of women not only lose stubborn weight but relieve or eliminate the symptoms associated with PMS and menopause as well. We use Natural Hormone Balancing to help our clients, so there are no prescribed medications, and your franchise team does not need any medical training.

Short Description: Bio-One offers an affordable and proven franchise opportunity for those who want to make a positive impact on their community through specialized cleaning services.
Long Description: Bio-One Inc. is the category-leader and first in biohazard decontamination and crime scene cleanup services growing quickly to 100+ franchise owners operating 130+ locations. Helping people and communities in their greatest times of need, Bio-one answers the call with discretion, care, and compassion.

Industry: Cleaning: Residential & Commercial, Pet Care & Grooming
Short Description: Be your own boss with the DoodyCalls franchise, the perfect opportunity for aspiring entrepreneurs looking for a low-cost, proven, and profitable business model in the rapidly-growing pet care industry, complete with comprehensive training and support.
Long Description: DoodyCalls is the nation’s leading pet waste management service for homeowners and their communities. The company scoops over 10 million doggie deposits annually.

Short Description: Recurring revenue, B2B services franchise (target market includes restaurants, retail, automotive, businesses with a storefront, etc.); now offering semi-absentee. Uncapped income potential. Recession resistant. Highly scalable!
Long Description: Our go-to-market approach leverages a proven B2B client acquisition strategy, compounded by resources provided from our corporate team.  Our franchise owners specialize in commercial restroom hygiene, tile floor deep cleaning, power washing, window treatmement, sanitizing storefronts, and providing solutions for paper and restroom supplies.  An Enviro-Master franchisee is able to leverage these offerings and support to acquire the best, long term customers and grow their business rapidly, with little to no competition.

Industry: Advertising, Business Services, Print, Copy & Mailing, Signs
Short Description: FastSigns offers entrepreneurs a low-cost, high-margin franchise opportunity with comprehensive training and support in the sign and graphics industry.
Long Description: Welcome to FastSigns, the leading franchise in the sign and graphics industry that has been providing high-quality visual communication solutions to businesses of all sizes for over 35 years. Our franchise opportunity offers entrepreneurs a chance to join a reputable brand with a proven business model and strong support system.

Short Description: Fibrenew is the experts in leather, plastic and vinyl restoration. We are a mobile service franchise with over 300 locations that specializes in the repair, restoration, and renewal of leather, plastic, vinyl, fabric, and upholstery. With a rich history that dates back to 1985, we manufacture a highly specialized proprietary product line and have pioneered the repair techniques and exclusive color matching technology that our technicians use every day. Our products, techniques, and color matching technology are what sets us apart and what has made us a leader in our industry.
Long Description: Investing in a Fibrenew franchise opens the door to financial independence and increased work-life balance. As pioneers of leather, plastic, and vinyl restoration for over 30 years, we provide an essential service that is always needed regardless of economic ups & downs – making our business model a safe option for long-term investments. Our low-overhead, mobile-based operation gives our 300+ active franchisees the freedom they’ve wanted while providing unlimited profit potential.

Short Description: HomeSmiles is the world’s most innovative property maintenance company. One Click or Call does it all. All annual property maintenance service items completed in a single appointment.
Long Description: At HomeSmiles, our mission is to simplify home and commercial property maintenance, creating safe, efficient, and well maintained spaces for families and businesses to thrive. We are committed to delivering comprehensive, all in one solutions with reliability, care, and a personal touch. We believe your property deserves the same attention and respect as the people inside it.

Short Description: Homewatch CareGivers provides compassionate in-home care services for seniors and individuals with disabilities to improve their quality of life.
Long Description: At Homewatch CareGivers, we give entrepreneurs a proven path to financial success while also giving them the opportunity to make positive change in the world. We are a home care franchise that provides customized services to elders and others who need assistance with their daily activities.

Short Description: Jet-Black is the #1 name in asphalt sealcoating and repair, backed by decades of growing success. We provide high-demand, repeat services that drive steady, recurring revenue—powered by perfected systems, proprietary tools and products, in a marketplace with virtually no brand competition.
Long Description: In a fractured and untrusted industry, Jet-Black has become the only household name in its markets for over three decades. While we are always ultimately selling the Jet-Black brand, our core services are driveway and parking lot asphalt sealcoating and repair. These are high-demand services that significantly beautify and more than double the life of asphalt. Our customers return every 1–3 years, launching a “jealous neighbor” cycle like nothing else.

Short Description: Junk King is the fastest growing, highest ranked company within the junk removal industry.
Long Description: Junk King is the fastest growing, highest ranked company within the junk removal industry. The Company is the 2nd largest junk removal company in North America with 100+ franchise units. Junk King is also currently the highest ranked service company in North America, with a system wide NPS (net promoter score) of 89%. Company revenue has been up year over year through the pandemic, as we are an essential business.

Short Description: From over-stuffed basements and garages to whole house clean-outs and commercial jobs, we’ve got the answer. We do our best to recycle or donate before we get to the dump.That itself sets us apart from any of our competition. We’ll even send the receipt for the donation back to the customer!
Long Description: This is a feel good business that helps people get rid of unwanted items. We have a fleet of beautifully branded trucks and a professional, courteous, well trained staff to handle any size job. From over-stuffed basements and garages to whole house clean-outs and commercial jobs, we’ve got the answer.

Short Description: Mr. Electric, a Neighborly company, is a nationally-recognized industry leader in electrical installation and repair franchising, making us a well-known and trusted brand.
Long Description: Mr. Electric is a national electrical franchise with over 200 franchisees. Our primary focus is on helping our franchisees meet and exceed their financial, professional and personal goals. As part of the Neighborly community of home service brands, our expertise lies in providing exactly the right tools, support and environment to turn those goals and dreams into a reality.

Short Description: Mr. Handyman, a Neighborly company, is a professional home repair service. OWNERS DO NOT DO THE HANDYMAN WORK AND YOU DO NOT NEED TO BE HANDY. This franchise is made up of Top Level business executives.
Long Description: Mr. Handyman is the recognized industry leader in home repairs and maintenance with more franchises units than any other handyman service. Our trusted name and brand recognition are your foot in the door for this Entrepreneur Franchise 500® cash business. The business requires minimal inventory and few employees. If you are ambitious to succeed, join our franchise family and secure your future.

Short Description: Mister Sparky Electric is the leader in residential electrical service. We help our franchise owners to grow and dominate their market by providing the tools and support necessary to overcome the obstacles of business ownership and growth within the thriving home services market.
Long Description: At Mister Sparky, we have been helping franchise owners create their success stories since 2006. With over 200 locations across the U.S.,Mister Sparky is a leading consumer electrical franchise, offering premium residential services!

Short Description: MRI is a professional services franchise that offers a compelling opportunity with minimal expenses and the potential for substantial profits. It features multiple income streams across a broad spectrum of industries, allowing candidates to leverage their existing connections and expertise. With a 50-year history, it provides a strong foundation while accommodating the flexibility that entrepreneurial individuals seek. Engaging in the noble profession of professional-level staffing and recruiting involves building relationships and coaching.
Long Description: Established in 1965, Management Recruiters International (MRINetwork) is a well-regarded franchise specializing in executive search and contract staffing services, delivering comprehensive solutions to both companies and candidates worldwide. MRINetwork boasts a network of search professionals, operating from approximately 250 offices across 18 countries. Our franchise owners bring a wealth of diverse business experience, spanning roles in operations, sales, and even executive leadership, enabling them to leverage their professional backgrounds and personal networks within our unique entrepreneurial opportunity. We embrace a model that focuses on industry specialization, delineated by well-defined disciplines, without being constrained by geographical boundaries. Our franchise package includes various income streams, cutting-edge training, ongoing support, and substantial discounts from vendors, which can reach up to an impressive 95% off retail rates.

Short Description: Vision: Offer multiple avenues for entrepreneurs to attain independence and autonomy while setting a worldwide standard for unattended retail through collaborative partnerships. Mission: To cultivate a community of inspired and empowered entrepreneurs.
Long Description: Vision: Offer multiple avenues for entrepreneurs to attain independence and autonomy while setting a worldwide standard for unattended retail through collaborative partnerships. Mission: To cultivate a community of inspired and empowered entrepreneurs.

Short Description: Join the booming industry of independent living and make a positive impact in the lives of the aging, disabled, and special needs populations with Next Day Access franchises, providing top-quality sales and installation of essential equipment such as ramps, stair lifts, and home modifications.
Long Description: Join the booming industry of independent living and make a positive impact in the lives of the aging, disabled, and special needs populations with Next Day Access franchises, providing top-quality sales and installation of essential equipment such as ramps, stair lifts, and home modifications.

Short Description: NTV360 is a business that finds host locations to place TVs which will loop local and/or regional advertising and marketing that is sold by the franchisee to local businesses.
Long Description: NTV360 is revolutionizing how local businesses connect with their communities through dynamic indoor digital signage. As a franchisee, you become a vital link in this transformation—helping small businesses thrive while building a profitable venture of your own. With an affordable entry point, low overhead, and a powerful subscription-based revenue model, NTV360 offers a unique opportunity to be your own boss while driving real impact in your local market.

Short Description: Join the leading HVAC service franchise that offers quality and reliable services, a unique comfort system approach, and a proven track record of success with One Hour Heating & Air Conditioning.
Long Description: One Hour Heating & Air Conditioning is the #1 largest HVAC service provider in the United States. As an Essential Service, our franchisees experience a more consistent demand and better work-life balance than is found within other industries. With comfort and convenience a top priority, the company offers an extensive line of products and services, including maintenance, installation, and repair, that keeps HVAC units running at peak performance year-round.

Short Description: Payroll Vault offers complete payroll services, including full service payroll processing, HR solutions, and workforce management for small medium sized businesses.
Long Description: Payroll Vault is the first to successfully franchise payroll and workforce services. Since inception in 2012, franchisees have purchased territories and are growing across all 50 states. With over 1,000+ territories available throughout the USA, opportunity is abundant.

Short Description: Pink’s Window Services is the bold and innovative franchise opportunity that offers top-tier window care solutions while empowering entrepreneurs to shine.
Long Description: Welcome to Pink’s Window Services, where we’ve redefined the game in window care and exterior cleaning. Our franchise isn’t just about owning a business; it’s about becoming a part of a dynamic, vibrant brand that stands out in a sea of ordinary.

Short Description: Pirtek is a business which will consist of the sale, custom assembly and installation of industrial and hydraulic hoses, fixed tube assemblies, fittings and related components and other distinctive products and services.
Long Description: PIRTEK USA is a fully equipped hydraulic hose service center with equipment and machinery needed for producing hose assemblies. Franchise owners worldwide have come from many walks of life, with backgrounds in areas such as banking, sales, marketing, and industrial management. Few, if any, have specific hydraulic or mechanical training. Our mission is to enable motivated entrepreneurs to accomplish the dream of owning their own business by using a system that has proven to be successful around the world.

Short Description: PostNet provides a wide range of convenient and high quality design, printing and shipping solutions for businesses and consumers, from custom business cards, brochures and flyers to eye-catching posters, banners, and signs.
Long Description: PostNet offers a franchise that is focused on the customer, providing high-quality design, shipping, and printing solutions under one roof. With over 30 years of experience in the industry, PostNet has established itself as a trustworthy and reliable brand. By offering a wide range of services and multiple carrier shipping choices, PostNet is the most convenient option around. PostNet provides entrepreneurs with recurring revenue, multi-carrier shipping services, an extensive menu of services, vibrant center designs, accessible support from HQ and fellow franchisees, and top-notch customer service.

Short Description: Real Estate Sales, LLC is one of the most trusted real estate mentoring companies in the United States and Canada. Our Investors/Mentors will take you by the hand and walk you through the entire process so you can make informed decisions.
Long Description: For nearly 18 years, Real Estate Sales LLC has been a trusted name across the U.S. in personalized real estate investing education. With an A+ rating and a track record of success, the company focuses on one thing: helping individuals prosper. What sets this opportunity apart isn’t just the brand reputation—it’s the system behind it.

Short Description: RealClean Aircraft Detailing is a niche mobile concept that focuses on interior/exterior detailing in addition to other specialized services for various types of aircraft.
Long Description: Start a new aircraft detailing business with one of the nation’s only aircraft detailing franchises. Celebrating over 20 years of operation in 2024, RealClean is expanding and looking to bring on individuals with a passion for business, aviation and serving clients. With low cost of entry, high earning potential and expert corporate support, pursuing professional independence is very possible. Join us at RealClean, where perfection meets passion.

Short Description: Senior Care Authority offers a rewarding and profitable franchise opportunity for compassionate individuals who want to make a meaningful difference in their communities by helping families find the best senior care options with a proven business model and comprehensive support system.
Long Description: If you’re reading this, chances are you’re interested in making an important contribution to your community as a business owner — but not just any business owner. You’d like to be one who offers valuable services that benefit older adults and their loved ones. It’s an important responsibility. When you join the Senior Care Authority family of franchise owners, you’ll become a trusted and respected resource for seniors and their families when they need your guidance the most.

Short Description: Senior Helpers is a leading provider of quality, compassionate, in-home care and assistance for the elderly. We provide you with the necessary tools and training to help set you up for success.
Long Description: At Senior Helpers, we take pride in being a trusted provider of quality, compassionate in-home care for seniors. With offices across the country and around the globe, we offer a wide range of services designed to support seniors in living comfortably and independently in their own homes. Whether it’s providing a helping hand with daily activities or offering full-time supervision and care, Senior Helpers delivers peace of mind to families nationwide.

Industry: Home Improvement, Interior/Exterior Design, Real Estate
Short Description: Set the Stage is an industry-leading home staging and furnishings franchise that offers turn-key success through proprietary systems, multi-revenue generators, and continual corporate support.
Long Description: Welcome to Set The Stage, the industry-leading home staging and furnishings franchise that offers unlimited opportunities for aspiring entrepreneurs, interior designers, creative realtors, and investors. With nearly a decade of perfecting our client relations, staging processes, and cost/profit analysis, Set The Stage provides a turn-key success opportunity for franchisees.

Short Description: SmartMarket Solutions offers A.I. Convenience Stores to investors – selling as a fully supported business opportunity.
Long Description: SmartMarket Solutions, a next-generation business opportunity from the founders of HealthyYOU Vending, brings together 25+ years of experience in self-service retail with breakthrough artificial intelligence to power the future of unattended convenience. As the original pioneers of healthy vending in 2007, we’ve reimagined retail delivery with SmartMarts—AI-vision-equipped smart coolers that blend cutting-edge technology with full-service business support.

Short Description: Sourdough & Co. is revolutionizing the fast-casual dining scene with its commitment to fresh, high-quality ingredients and exceptional service. Offering a diverse menu of gourmet sandwiches, soups, and salads, we cater to a health-conscious audience that demands quality and flavor.
Long Description: Sourdough & Co offers high-quality, all-natural food without preservatives, emphasizing culture, cleanliness, and healthier options. Its simple business model features minimal staffing, flexible hours, and multiple revenue streams including catering, loyalty programs, and delivery services, supported by national supply chain partners. With over 80 locations and strong franchisee validation, it’s easy to operate even without restaurant experience thanks to proven systems and processes.

Short Description: Stadium on Wheels is a baseball-themed food truck featuring ballpark classics such as footlong hot dogs, nachos, soft pretzels, and lemonade that delivers game changing profitability.
Long Description: As a Stadium on Wheels owner, you get to call the shots! You build your own team, decide where you want to serve, and choose your own operating hours. Mobile units allow for low overhead cost and maximum net profitability as there is no rent and minimal employees needed.

Short Description: Stand Strong Fencing is a business which specializes in the sale and installation of wood, steel, aluminum, and vinyl fencing and related products for residential and commercial customers.
Long Description: At Stand Strong Fencing, we offer more than just a franchise opportunity; we provide a pathway to building a resilient business backed by a legacy of excellence. As a Stand Strong franchisee, you’ll gain access to a robust support system that sets you up for success from day one. Proudly affiliated with the esteemed HorsePower Brands network, we offer unparalleled resources and guidance to fuel your growth journey. From comprehensive training programs to ongoing assistance, we ensure you’re equipped with the tools and knowledge needed to excel in your market.

Short Description: TeamLogic IT helps businesses stay safe, productive and profitable through the smart use of technology.
Long Description: TeamLogic IT was created to become the go-to IT team for small and medium-sized businesses. We offer fast responses to IT challenges; but more importantly, we act as an IT advisor to our customers, monitoring their vital IT systems to prevent problems and eliminate downtime. We also analyze their businesses to recommend specific technology solutions that can help them grow. We’re not just the people that business owners call when something breaks; we are business partners who provide guidance and access to new technologies that can help make our clients more efficient, more profitable and more secure.

Short Description: The Camp is a businesses offering health, fitness and weight control services.
Long Description: The Camp Transformation Center franchise is a pioneering fitness brand within an industry that generates over $80 billion annually. The Camp is changing lives nationwide through a unique approach to health and fitness that combines high-intensity interval training with a supportive, community-driven atmosphere.

Short Description: The Tox is a personal wellness service that focuses on lymphatic and digestive body sculpting.
Long Description: The Tox Technique is a unique blend of body work that heals your body from the inside out. We are the only brand of our kind: dedicated to lymphatic health. Our expert proprietary techniques work directly with your lymphatic and digestive system to detoxify the body and mind. The Tox delivers quantifiable, proven treatments that can help with water retention, remove excess toxins, manage bloating, and sculpt the body – all in an upscale spa environment designed for client comfort.

Short Description: Voda Cleaning and Restoration is franchising’s first & only cleaning and restoration franchise.
Long Description: At Voda, our mission is to make life easier for those responsible for creating inviting, healthy spaces where people live, work, and do business. As a Voda franchisee, you’ll help customers be the heroes of their homes and businesses by providing essential cleaning (carpet, upholstery, tile & grout) and restoration (water and mold mitigation) services when they need it most. With our differentiated branding and robust service offerings, you’ll have multiple revenue streams from both residential and commercial customers.

Short Description: Since 2012, WaveMAX® Laundry, based in Jacksonville, FL, has focused its business model on developing the prototypical market and store that can scale and sustain a national chain of coin-only laundromats. Their franchise development is being led by Dennis Mulgannon who successfully built Home Care Assistance, Junk King and The Flying Locksmiths into national franchise brands.
Long Description: WaveMAX® has developed a system to change the way coin laundry locations are perceived and operated. It's a fantastic absentee business model that makes money when you are not around and has an extremely low employee count.

Short Description: Woofie’s® leads the pack in superior pet care and continually earns awards and accolades recognizing us as the best in the business for pet sitting, dog walking and mobile pet spa grooming services. We stand out in the pet care franchise industry because of our recession/pandemic resilience and our unique combination of services that create multiple revenue streams for our franchisees.
Long Description: Work from home – and with pets! The Woofie’s franchise program is a dynamic, exciting, and ideal opportunity for someone interested in joining the $100 Billion pet industry. After offering exceptional pet care services for thousands of pets for over 17 years, our time-tested, mobile concept has a streamlined business model, strong brand image, and an unparalleled reputation for excellence. Woofie’s® continues to be on the cutting edge of the booming pet industry and employs the latest technologies and best practices in professional pet care.

Short Description: Ziggi’s Coffee is a coffee and beverage location offering great variety in drinks and food with a franchise model that focuses on support, operations and profitability.
Long Description: Ziggi’s isn’t just another coffee shop—it’s a well-oiled operation with a focus on premium drinks, genuine customer service, and a business model built for scalability. With flexible formats like single- or double-sided drive-thrus and cafe hybrids, Ziggi’s is designed to meet the needs of today’s fast-moving consumers while delivering a consistent, high-quality experience.

Short Description: Zoom Room is a comprehensive pet care franchise offering training, play, and retail services in a safe and fun environment for pets and their owners.
Long Description: With Zoom Room, you’ll be offering a one-stop-shop for all pet parents, where they can find everything from high-quality training classes to interactive play sessions and even retail items. Our state-of-the-art facilities are designed to provide a safe and fun environment for pets and their owners to bond, play, and learn together.
